short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A browser extension for effortless lead creation and management.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Unlock the power of relationship intelligence with InsightsCRM LeadGen. Say goodbye to hours wasted on searching and say hello to streamlined productivity. Our cutting-edge tool seamlessly integrates business connections, allowing you to research and engage with people effortlessly. Unlock a world of opportunities and dramatically reduce the time it takes to find your successive big wins. Don't let valuable opportunities miss your attention - empower yourself with InsightsCRM LeadGen today.

With InsightsCRM LeadGen, you can:

Leverage your Connections to drive your business
You can now seamlessly create your prospects from right where you work; visit profiles onprofessional social platforms and your connections profile and add them as prospects within InsightsCRM.

Create Notes and Add Tasks 
Create notes, add tasks, and send emails to every contact. Stay organized and never miss a beat with your key contacts, whether it's an existing client or a new connection. 

Interaction History
Take control of your interactions with a comprehensive interaction history on all your LinkedIn connections. Access past emails, meeting notes, and call notes more efficiently. Stay up to date with critical contacts and effortlessly plan your next steps.

Profile Management 
Manage contact profiles that include background summary, geographic location, and current role. 

Drive greater productivity while Prospecting.
Get ahead of the competition with InsightsCRM LeadGen - the all-in-one solution for efficient prospecting and contact management. Try it now and experience a new level of productivity in growing your business.
